casebody.data:
Cameron Lee HINTON
v.
Donnie HARRISON ; Wake County Detention Center No. 403P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 28, 2017 Mr. Cameron Lee Hinton, for Hinton, Cameron Lee Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Harrison, Donnie, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 27th of November 2017 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of November 2017."
